metadata.name: Remix Voucher v2
metadata.description:
This token is redeemable for One Chaotic Remix derivative of an NFT you own.

To use:

1. Contact Me, Ethan S. Brewerton

2. You will send me the image that you would like re-created in my style

3. I will ask that you send back this token for me to begin your derivative.

4. I will create your Remix as an NFT in this collection, and send you a version to ok.

5. Once approved, I will mint and send the finished derivative to your ETH address.
